Reviews.Title: “Average hotel with extremely friendly staff”

Reviews.Content: hotel located red light district main street dont actually hear hustle bustle husband pleasant quiet stay hotel 5 days staff friendly especially reception feel welcome friends guests stayed 8th floor daily cleaning request wont clean dont request tell reception clean time morning clean comfortable cheap comfortable stay singapore welcoming staff consider hotel location excellent near bus stop 2 train stations lots nearby eating choose mini grocery road 24 hrs
